subject: Urgent: Q4 Report Due
body: Hi Team, I need the Q4 financial report by EOD tomorrow. Please make sure to include the marketing spend analysis. Thanks.

subject: Tech Weekly: AI is taking over
body: In this week's issue: New AI models released, stock market trends, and 5 tips for better coding. Click here to read more...

subject: New Job Opportunity at Google
body: Hello, I came across your profile and thought you'd be a great fit for our Senior Engineer role. Are you open to a chat?

subject: You won a cruise!
body: Congratulations! You've been selected for a free Caribbean cruise. Claim your ticket now!

subject: Sync Meeting Agenda
body: Hi all, for tomorrow's sync, please update your status on the Jira board. We will discuss the blocking issues in the payment gateway.

subject: Dinner this weekend?
body: Hey! Are you free to come over for dinner on Saturday? Dad is making his famous lasagna.

subject: Invoice Available
body: Your AWS invoice for October is now available. Total amount: $24.50. Login to view details.

subject: Feedback on Design V2
body: We reviewed the latest mocks. The color scheme looks good, but can we make the logo bigger? Also, the login button is hard to find.

subject: Open Enrollment for Benefits
body: It's that time of year again! Open enrollment begins next Monday. Please review the attached guide for changes to the health plan.

subject: [Bug] NullPointerException in Auth Service
body: Seeing a spike in NPEs in the auth service since the last deploy. Can someone take a look ASAP? Logs attached.
action_items: Investigate the NullPointerException in the auth service.

subject: Black Friday Sale!
body: Get 50% off your annual membership if you renew this week. Don't miss out!

subject: Coffee?
body: Heading to the break room for coffee. Want anything?

subject: Security Training Reminder
body: You have 3 days left to complete the mandatory security awareness training. Please login to the portal.

subject: PROJ-123: Status changed to Done
body: User 'Alice' updated PROJ-123 (Backend API for Search) to Done.

subject: All Hands Meeting
body: Join us for the quarterly All Hands meeting this Friday at 2 PM. We have some exciting announcements.
